title: Asset Building through Credit
summary: presents the methodology, early client results and lessons learned from a demonstration project launched in 2011 by FIELD and the Citi Foundation that tested a secured credit card program with five microenterprise organizations. Drawing from their experiences, the paper provides insights for organizations, coaches and financial institutions about the ideal customer profile, card approval rates, and credit profiles of cardholders at the time of application and preliminary findings on credit score outcomes.
